text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon has opened a<n>four-length lead! And it
looks like<n>she's going to keep it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon leads! 2,400 meters can't<n>stop her from going gate
to wire! Six<n>for six! The undefeated Double<n>Crown is hers!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice finishes the Japanese Derby in<n>second. She may have
failed to<n>overtake Mihono Bourbon, but it's<n>huge progress
nonetheless.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days later, I take the team to<n>an amusement park in
Chiba.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! We're here—the amusement<n>park of dreams! With
the princess's<n>castle, and Big Lightning Mountain!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I thought it'd be nice to treat her to<n>the theme park she's
always wanted<n>to go to, but, well...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Wait... There's no one else here. It's<n>like our very own
kingdom. Hehe. That<n>sounds nice. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Trainer... Rice here truly believes this<n>is the place she's
been so keen on<n>visiting...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen whispers into my ear as an<n>oblivious Rice Shower
beams with<n>excitement.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I know money's tight this month, butdid you really have to bring her tothis amusement park?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeahhh...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeahhh...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, McQueen! Rumor has it<n>there's a mystery attraction<n>
underground. We gotta uncover the<n>truth!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: H-hey! That door is for employees<n>only!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Let's get going too, Trainer! ♪

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah, all right.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They say time flies when you're<n>having fun, so I guess that
means we<n>had fun, location notwithstanding.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
We got to go on almost every ride.<n>Good thing there
weren't many<n>people today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Every time she expresses genuine<n>joy at being here, I feel
a little pang of<n>guilt.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hey, um... Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I want to end the day by going on the<n>ferris wheel. So, um...
would you join<n>me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, she's too pure—my heart can't<n>take it... If she wants
to ride the ferris<n>wheel, then the ferris wheel it is.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Yay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The city rolls on and on as far as the<n>eye can see, dyed
orange by the<n>setting sun.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...But the breathtaking sight is lost on<n>Rice Shower.
Something's been<n>bugging her ever since we got on.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, um... It's just...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to say thank you. For<n>everything. I really didn't
think I'd be<n>able to achieve so much.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I mean, I still can't believe that Igot second place in the Derby.
choice_data_list: All thanks to your hard work.
All thanks to your hard work.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hehe...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...So, that got me thinking. I'm happy<n>with second place,
but... what if I could<n>be first?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... I want to win. Against Mihono<n>Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I want to win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her ambition has only grown and<n>grown, just as the gap
between her<n>and her undefeated rival has shrunk.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Wanting to win against someone like<n>this—I couldn't have
done it without<n>you. So I had to let you know.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ohh, now that I say it out loud, it's<n>kind of embarrassing...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Must be your newfound confidence<n>talking. Next race,
you're taking first.<n>We'll beat Bourbon together.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Must be your newfound confidence<n>talking. Next race,
you're taking first.<n>We'll beat Bourbon together.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Together... Yeah, we can do it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whew! Never been so amused in my<n>life! What about you,
Rice?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was like a land of dreams. I<n>had so much fun. ♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, thanks for the treat today. I'll<n>keep up the hard
work!
choice_data_list: And I'll be right by your side.
And I'll be right by your side.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Looks like someone had a magical<n>time. I suppose you
were right to bring<n>her here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...But do make sure your next treat is<n>a bit more proper.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I-I'll do my best.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The following day, Rice dives back<n>into training with
renewed vigor.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep<n>following...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ooh! She's hanging in there!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
McQueen keeps upping the pace, but<n>Rice isn't falling
behind.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's what happens when you set a<n>clear goal for
yourself. It helps bring<n>out the best in you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's what happens when you set a<n>clear goal for
yourself. It helps bring<n>out the best in you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Especially so in her case, it looks like.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Especially so in her case, it looks like.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: By a clear goal, you mean McQueen?<n>Or Mihono Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Not just them. When Rice sets her<n>mind to something, she
never gives up<n>on it—no matter what it is.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Not just them. When Rice sets her<n>mind to something, she
never gives up<n>on it—no matter what it is.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh. I gotchu.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, she'll be able to give her<n>best performance yet
in her rematch<n>with Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The training will do some good for<n>McQueen too, who has
the<n>Takarazuka Kinen coming up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice seems to be lifting the entire<n>team higher. But
sometimes, reality<n>drags you back down.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her desperate cry echoes across the<n>track...
